description: Sparkle Doodle is the latest FREE art and drawing app from WizardApps that lets your imagination run wild! Perfect for both children and adults, Sparkle Doodle will keep you entertained any time of day! With four brightly colored glitter pens that come in two different sizes, you can draw and doodle to your heart's content. Create art or just scribble away with this fun new app. Be sure to get creative-- you can even use Sparkle Doodle to play games like Pictionary.
